About me.

I am an aspiring web-developer based in Toronto, Ontario. I had graduated in 2019 from Ryerson University's Business Technology Management program and worked as a sales representative thereafter. After work, I would try to absorb and apply as much web-development knowledge as possible, in hopes of eventually landing a position in the field.

When I am not developing, I It has been a long, arduous journey, and sometimes I am shocked at how far i've come. When im not developing websites, I am jogging and canvassing the city of Toronto for new running trails, with my goal of completeing a marathon.
